modName: Going on a Bear Hunt - Michael Rosen in Skyrim
summary: Adds a Michael Rosen follower to the game, featuring roughly 400 lines of unique random and situational dialogue.
descriptionHtml:
!!Attention¡¡¡
This mod was made by Sun Ra,
http://steamcommunity.com/id/Sun_Ra/
Workshop page,
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=213651770
----------------

I present: Michael Rosen in Skyrim. This mod contains around 400 lines of unique dialogue based on random and specific (wearing armor/in dungeons/fighting specific enemies) conditions. Rosen functions exactly like any other follower in Skyrim, so you can trade, give him commands, and dismiss.

Some of the specific conditions depend on if he is in clearable dungeons, shops, cities, or the wilderness. They also depend on his armor, or if potatoes/tomatoes are in your inventory, or a circlet is worn on his head. There might be a few dialogue related bugs, as I haven't been able to test all of them.

You can find Michael upstairs in the Bards College in Solitude.

Special thanks to Nichevo on Deck16, with his fantastic follower guide. Here's the link for anybody interested:
http://deck16.net/post/22645519500/making-a-unique-voiced-follower-in-skyrim-part-1

Future updates(?):
- Marriage options for perverts
- More lines
- Bug fixes
- Cow levels
author: Sun Ra
